home.subtitle: Software Engineer | Passionate about creating modern and efficient applications.
home.description: Hello! I am a software engineer with 6 years of experience in building web applications and also in machine learning. My current stack consists of technologies like Python, Golang, Django, and React. When I'm not coding, I enjoy soccer and exploring new places.

vert.description: I work on developing innovative solutions, focusing on high-performance web applications with modern technologies.

elife.description: I developed and maintained virtual assistants such as chatbots for various companies across different industries.

live.description: I conducted research and implemented artificial intelligence solutions to improve urban mobility in smart cities.

python.description: Backend development, Data Analysis, Scripting, and Machine Learning with Python.

django.description: Designing and implementing efficient Web Applications.

golang.description: Development of RESTful APIs and Microservices.

react.description: Developing and maintaining efficient and responsive User Interfaces using React.

node.description: Developing RESTful APIs and Webhooks with Node.js and Express.

typescript.description: Enhancing JavaScript development with static typing and advanced features.

postgres.description: Managing and performing queries on relational databases.
